14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
January 5, 1960
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Following your phone call — and before I leave — I
note you have $5,500 for travel (including committee);
$1,400 for supplies and materials (postage, stationery,
rentals, etc.); and $3,200 for services (could also
include rentals — but mostly for films, printing, etc.).
Hence, I think you shouldn*t hesitate to offer to reim¬
burse Dick Evans for costs — as discussed.
Best, in haste,
Harry J. Skornia
President
